mapper.update: update sc_resource_report set sales_today = #{salesToday,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ship_today = #{shipToday,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ready_ship_today = #{readyShipToday,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, inventory_today = #{inventoryToday,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, system_type = #{systemType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pmid = #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, sales_today, ship_today, ready_ship_today, inventory_today, `date`, create_time, system_type, pmid from sc_resource_report where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, sales_today, ship_today, ready_ship_today, inventory_today, `date`, create_time, system_type, pmid from sc_resource_report
